mapper.select: select * from ecm_param where PARA_PARENT_ID = #{paraParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and IS_VALIDATE = '0001001' order by PARA_CODE
mapper.update:
update ecm_param
PARA_NAME = #{paraName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PARA_PARENT_ID = #{paraParentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK1 = #{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK2 = #{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK3 = #{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VALIDATE = #{isValidate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where PARA_CODE = #{paraCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into ecm_param
PARA_CODE,
PARA_NAME,
PARA_PARENT_ID,
REMARK1,
REMARK2,
REMARK3,
IS_VALIDATE,
